description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Blast through the procedurally generated levels as you and your partner cadet deliver an exceedingly volatile metal - Andromium - to a research lab. Requiring absolute concentration to win, this game will keep you on your toes for every second you play it.
